context.mission: Housing veterans and families with dignity and technical excellence.

critical_findings: Family content is underrepresented (19.3% gap to reach 30% target)
Veteran content is overrepresented (13.2% over 10% target)
Property buyer content is slightly overrepresented (6.2% over 60% target)
Lighthouse performance testing blocked by server issues

comprehensive_plan.executive_summary: Properties 4 Creation faces critical content balance issues with family-focused content underrepresented and veteran content overrepresented. Technical issues include accessibility violations and poor SEO performance. The plan prioritizes family content expansion, veteran content reduction, and accessibility fixes.

actions: Fix all HIGH severity accessibility violations (missing ARIA labels)
Create dedicated Family Resources page with school district information
Add family testimonials and success stories to existing pages
Reduce veteran-focused content by 13.2% across Veterans and VeteranServices pages

phase_2_content.focus: Family Content Expansion & Veteran Content Reduction
actions: Expand family-focused content by 19.3% to reach 30% target
Add interactive tools: school district ratings, childcare proximity search
Consolidate veteran content from Veterans/VeteranServices pages
Improve SEO on 18 pages with scores below 70
Fine-tune property buyer content (only 6.2% over target)
Fix Lighthouse testing environment and performance issues
Implement competitive features (market trend reports, ROI calculators)
Complete SEO optimization across all pages

prioritized_action_items.item: Consolidate veteran-focused content across Veterans and VeteranServices pages by 13.2%
prioritized_action_items.impact: Reduces overrepresented veteran content to meet 10% target

prioritized_action_items.item: Create comprehensive Family Resources page with school district information, family-friendly amenities, and childcare proximity
Add family testimonials and success stories across existing pages
Add proper title tags and meta descriptions to all 18 pages with missing SEO elements
prioritized_action_items.impact: Improves search engine rankings and organic traffic
components_affected: All pages with SEO scores below 70

prioritized_action_items.item: Implement school district rating tool and childcare proximity search
Create VA loan calculator for veteran users
prioritized_action_items.impact: Addresses veteran content gap and provides practical tool

prioritized_action_items.item: Fix Lighthouse testing environment and resolve server configuration issues
Consolidate redundant property-related content and streamline property listings
prioritized_action_items.impact: Reduces overrepresented property buyer content by 46.2%

prioritized_action_items.item: Implement competitive features: property investment ROI calculator, market trend reports
prioritized_action_items.impact: Differentiates from competitors and adds value

content_balance.primary_gap: 19.3% family content increase, 13.2% veteran content reduction needed

accessibility.current: Multiple HIGH severity ARIA label violations

seo.primary_action: Add missing title tags and meta descriptions

technical.target: Lighthouse tests pass, performance metrics established

import type {
  StatMetric,
  RenovationStandard,
  FinancialBreakdown,
  ExtendedProperty,
} from '../types';
import { properties, getPropertyById } from '../data/properties';

/**
 * Enhanced Backend API Service
 *
 * This service supports both development (mock data) and production (real backend) modes.
 *
 * Development Mode (Default):
 * - Uses mock data with simulated network latency
 * - No environment variables required
 * - Perfect for frontend development and testing
 *
 * Production Mode:
 * - Set VITE_API_URL environment variable to enable real backend integration
 * - Falls back to mock data if backend is unavailable
 * - Automatic switching based on environment configuration
 *
 * Environment Setup:
 * - Copy .env.example to .env and configure VITE_API_URL
 * - Development: Leave VITE_API_URL empty (uses mock data)
 * - Production: Set VITE_API_URL to your backend endpoint
 */

const SIMULATED_LATENCY = 800; // ms

// Environment configuration for backend integration
cons

files.summary:
/**
 * P4C Content Balance Auditor
 *  * Version: 1.0.0
 * Purpose: Analyzes the semantic weight of content to ensure a 50/50 balance
 * between Veteran and Family outreach.
 */

import type {
  AuditResult,
  RouteConfig,
  ContentAuditorConfig,
  ContentType,
  StoryContent,
} from '../types/contentBalance';
import type { ExtendedProperty } from '../types';

/**
 * Default configuration for the content auditor
 */

  veteranKeywords: [
    'vash',
